/*eslint-disable*/ import React from "react"; // reactstrap components import { Container, Row, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, Col, Button, Badge } from "reactstrap"; import classnames from "classnames"; class ServiceBooking extends React.Component { state = { iconTabs: 1, plainTabs: 1 }; toggleNavs = (e, state, index) => { e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [state]: index }); }; render() { return (

To book a service at the venue

In three simple steps, book an appointment at a salon
or spa of your choice!

this.toggleNavs(e, "iconTabs", 1)} href="#pablo" role="tab" > Home this.toggleNavs(e, "iconTabs", 3)} href="#pablo" role="tab" > Messages

Book

Search for the service you need, select a suitable expert you want to visit, and book a Venue appointment.

Be On Time

Reach the venue at the scheduled time.

Pay

Pay in cash or with a credit card and enjoy the service!

); } } export default ServiceBooking;
